Col 2

### Sepal Width by Species
```{r}
iris %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Species, Y=Sepal.Width, color=Species)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```

### Histograma
```{r}
iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Sepal.Width, 
             y=..density.., 
             color=Species)) + 
  geom_histogram() +
  geom_density()+
  facet_wrap(.~Species)
```
